headline.main: U.S. FORCES HIT OUT; ' One Wave' Advances 2 Miles After Driving Across a River

lead_paragraph: WASHINGTON, Nov. 2 -- United States forces on Guadalcanal Island seized the initiative on Sunday (Solomons time) and as a result of their attacks "enemy artillery fire was silenced and the Japanese were reported to be retreating slowly," the Navy Department announced tonight.

keywords.name: organizations
keywords.value: MEDITERRANEAN, AFRICAN, BALKAN AND NEAR EAST FRONT
